Package index

Main Functions

Core functions for creating Bayesian forest plots

bayes_forest()
Create Bayesian Forest Plot for Meta-Analysis
rob_plot()
Create Risk of Bias Plot
overall_plot()
Create posterior plots for Bayesian meta-analysis
sensitivity_plot()
Generate Sensitivity Analysis Plot for Bayesian Meta-Analysis
ecdf_plot()
Create ECDF Plot for Sensitivity Analysis

Example Datasets

Example data for binary and continuous outcomes

binary_outcome
Studies Comparing Medications on Post-Operative Nausea and Vomiting
cont_outcome
Studies Comparing Truncal Blocks on Pain Outcomes
